verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: says] [ARG1: President Trump has been more focused on a possible summit with North Korea and trade than Roseanne Barr 's problems] .
The White House says President Trump [V: has] been more focused on a possible summit with North Korea and trade than Roseanne Barr 's problems .
The White House says [ARG1: President Trump] has [V: been] [ARG2: more focused on a possible summit with North Korea and trade than Roseanne Barr 's problems] .
